channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 2025: a year in art on The Verge
item.description: The Verge art team's favorite projects this year spanned the circus surrounding DOGE, the myths of the Vietnam War, the privacy crisis for trans people online, the vast surveillance network aimed at tracking down Iranian military dissidents, and much more. We built a kaleidoscope to showcase some standout products from The Verge's gift guides, sent […]...

item.title: Apple is rumored to still be facing 'technical challenges' in producing its crease-free foldable iPhone
item.description: Apple really wants its folding iPhone to be free from creases, and it may not have quite got there yet.

item.title: Shark FacialPro Glow Review: Can You Really Get a Professional-Quality Facial at Home?
item.description: This quirky at-home facial device made my face glow for days.

item.title: Humanoid robots are coming. Eventually?
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on robotics and AI, follow Robert Hart. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. We're taking a winter break! The Stepback will be back on January 11th, 2026. […]

item.title: Our favorite stuff of 2025
item.description: Hi, friends! Welcome to Installer No. 110, your guide to the best and Verge-iest stuff in the world. (If you're new here, welcome, happy holidays, and also you can read all the old editions at the Installer homepage.) This week, I've been reading about mall Santas and malleable software and phone bans, wondering how I […]

item.title: Israel’s famed VC Jon Medved, diagnosed with ALS, backed the tech that will improve his life
item.description: In perhaps the last public interview of one Israel's most famous VCs, Jon Medved tells TechCrunch how tech will enhance his life.

item.description: Whether you're cooking a side of fries or dinner for the whole family, there's a Ninja air fryer for your kitchen.

item.title: Grâce à une simulation, les scientifiques retracent le passage éclair près de la Terre d’un objet venu d’ailleurs
item.description: Pour modéliser les trajectoires complexes, les simulations numériques sont des outils avancés qu’utilisent les agences spatiales, dont la Nasa et l’ESA. La comète 3I/Atlas, récemment découverte, constitue un exemple parfait de l'application de cette technologie. Nous vous proposons de visualiser...

item.title: Avec -50 % sur ce pack complet Philips Hue, Boulanger fait un beau cadeau de Noël pour illuminer votre intérieur
item.description: En optant pour ce pack Philips Hue, vous allez pouvoir créer en quelques minutes une ambiance lumineuse douce et personnalisable, idéale pour transformer son salon en cocon chaleureux pendant les fêtes de Noël : bonne nouvelle, ce pack complet est en promo à 149 euros contre 279 euros de base.

item.title: 5 Best Monitors for the Mac Mini (2025), Tested and Reviewed

item.title: Research Reveals the Optimal Way to Optimize
item.description: The leading approach to the simplex method, a widely used technique for balancing complex logistical constraints, can’t get any better.
